title: Ticket #5182: "Private" daemon sinful's primary address is not in addrs.
description: If PRIVATE_NETWORK_INTERFACE is set, daemonCore->InfoCommandSinfulStringMyself( true ) will return a sinful whose primary address is PRIVATE_NETWORK_INTERFACE but whose addrs parameter does not contain that address. This seems likely to cause problems (like TCP_FORWARDING_HOST in #5145).
creator: tlmiller
